=== BoF agenda and discussion ===
AzraelNightwalker: we should check out other distro's tools, namely:  
* <nowiki>[[http://revisor.fedoraunity.org/|Fedora's Revisor]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://en.opensuse.org/Build_Service/KIWI|openSUSE's KIWI]]</nowiki>
and see how they work.

Also there are some existing Ubuntu tools:
* <nowiki>[[http://uck.sourceforge.net/|UCK]]</nowiki> - Ubuntu Customization Kit
* <nowiki>[[http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/|Reconstructor]]</nowiki> - Reconstructor
* <nowiki>[[http://linux.dell.com/wiki/index.php/DRU_Disc_Remastering_Utility|DRU]]</nowiki> - Disc Remastering Utility
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.debian.org/CDDT|Custom Debian Distribution Toolkit]]</nowiki> - work in progress
* <nowiki>[[http://www.remastersys.klikit.org/|Remastersys]]</nowiki> - a tool for making a livecd from your Ubuntu installation
* <nowiki>[[http://www.gnewsense.org/Builder/Builder|Builder]]</nowiki> - gNewSense builder script

Besides, we could also work with Debian on a common tool:
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.debian.org/CustomDebian|CDD]]</nowiki> - Custom Debian Distributions on Debian Wiki

There is a new spec that might supersede this: CustomisedIsoImageTools

Another new project: <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/unidistro|Unidistro]]</nowiki> - A framework to create and maintain a Debian/Ubuntu derivative distro
